document_data.name: Fahren
document_data.mainbody: '''Fahren''' was a [[Netherese]] [[arcanist]] who developed [[spell]]s that affected the sight of others.
document_data.Description: The [[inventor]] was highly-respected and was said to be a true "master of [[magic]]". He educated both [[mage]]s and [[rogue]]s in [[the Art]].
document_data.Relationships: Fahren had a good relationship with both types of his students. However, the thieves he taught used his spells to rob others.
document_data.History: Fahren was born in {{YearlinkConvert|2357|NY}}. Fahren died very young at the age of 40 in {{YearlinkConvert|2397|NY}}, making him one of the shortest-lived arcanists of the era, along with [[Efteran]].
document_data.Rumors & Legends: It was rumored that one of his rogue students used ''glitterdust'' to rob a rival arcanist. This in turn led to Fahren's death when the rival took it out on him by destroying Fahren with a ''[[sphere of annihilation]]''.
